item.title: Building Elixir/Phoenix Release With Docker
item.description: This is a short post about how I build my Elixir/Phoenix releases with Docker and extract the tarball that will be deployed to production. In this approach, we are just building the release with Docker. We are not building the image to run our application in a Docker container. This post assume that you have the basic knowledge of Docker, building Elixir release and using Elixir 1.
